title: One year old PIXEL 3 is restarting itself into a loop
content:
2 Days ago my Pixel 3 start to restart itself into a loop.

It's like the phone is turned on, then the off-menu appearing, then the camera app, back and forward, and finally the phone restarts itself, and doing the same issue.
No need to say I couldn't use the phone.

Tried "Safe mode" - didn't work.
I tried getting into recovery mode, which was a pain because the phone tried to restart, but finally managed to wipe and factory reset.
The phone worked well again for 2 days, and now it started the issue again.

I guess if it was a hardware issue, the phone wouldn't come back to normal, so maybe it must be a software issue?

Please,
What should I do next?

p.s.
I can't use the warranty, because I've bought the phone in another country.
